short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pauses any HTML5 videos that would autoplay. Click to play the video when you want to watch it, not when you open the browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Limited to YouTube videos. 

The extension will not prevent HTML5 videos hosted on other websites auto-playing, but for YouTube videos, the extension will pause the video when the page loads.
